item.title: EP 882 - The Curse Of The Pink Corvette
item.itunes:title: The Curse Of The Pink Corvette
item.description:
Today we meet a boy who was driver around Tucson, Arizona by a ghost car, and then we meet a young man who might be under the influence of an unending love spell!
